text: Billy Engelhart (born March 20, 1942 in Madison, Wisconsin), is a former driver in the CART Championship Car series. He raced in the 1980–81 seasons, with 9 career starts, including the 1980 Indianapolis 500. He finished in the top ten 4 times, with his best finish in 8th position in 1981 at Milwaukee. ==External links== *Driver Database Profile Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Indianapolis 500 drivers Category:Sportspeople from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Racing drivers from Wisconsin
title: Billy Engelhart
